title: The Amorous Adventures of Jake Karter
description: Jake Karter, a man living hand to mouth, has little to recommend him. He has no girlfriend, no money, no prospects... and a rather strong body odour. One afternoon, however, his life suddenly changes, and apparently for the better - in entirely mysterious circumstances, leading him to relationships, outcomes and encounters that he had never imagined to be possible. But as he progresses through a new world of adventure, excitement and intrigue, danger awaits...
author: Jake Karter
